heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny. Highs in the low to mid 70s. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear. Areas of valley fog. Lows mainly in the low to mid 40s, with mid to upper 30s in northern cold hollows, and around 50 near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming light, variable to south, except south around 5 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly sunny after any morning fog. Highs again in the low to mid 70s, except mid to upper 70s in the broad valleys west. South winds around 5 mph.
